title: Mayweather Vs. Pacquiao: A Fight For The Ages
teaser: Boxing fans have been waiting for this for years. On Saturday, Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao finally meet in the ring.
contentencoded:
Boxing fans have been waiting for this for years. On Saturday in Las Vegas, Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao finally meet in the ring.

Fight fans are expecting that this will be one of the greatest bouts in the sport’s history, and one that will put an end to the question – who is the world’s best boxer. Here & Now’s sports analyst Mike Pesca joins host Robin Young with his thoughts on the epic showdown.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
